titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the NSZZ "Solidarność" (Labor organization) Records
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Irena Czernichowska.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2013-12-13T15:25-0800
profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid is written in English

change.item: Descriptions of reformatted sound recordings added
Descriptions of reformatted sound recordings added
Descriptions of reformatted sound recordings added

did.abstract: Sound recording copies of plenary sessions and sessions of the presidium of the Komisja Krajowa, plenary sessions of the Krajowy Zjazd Delegatów, sessions of various regional congresses and local branches, sessions of various workers' self-management committees, and negotiation sessions with government representatives. The recordings relate to labor, economic and political conditions in Poland.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. Use copies of some sound recordings, video recordings, or motion picture material in this collection are available for immediate access. To listen to other sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], NSZZ "Solidarność" (Labor organization) records, [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1992.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Polish trade union and political movement.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Sound recording copies of plenary sessions and sessions of the presidium of the Komisja Krajowa, plenary sessions of the Krajowy Zjazd Delegatów, sessions of various regional congresses and local branches, sessions of various workers' self-management committees, and negotiation sessions with government representatives. The recordings relate to labor, economic and political conditions in Poland.

did.unittitle: Sound recordings of conflicts and strikes

physdesc.extent: There are three copies of the Health Service recordings. The first is 3 cassettes long. The second is 2 cassettes long. The third is 3 cassettes long.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: The sound quality is often poor on the accessioned cassettes and, thus, on the digital files.
